title: No idea how SHOULD i fix, update failed, check logs

embed.description: Provides free image upload and hosting integration for forums. Free picture hosting and photo sharing for websites and blogs.

body: I did not know why, here is the pic for it, I tired almost every methods online, nothing worked. hextech tool- Not working，  reinstall- Not working,  delete files- not working， only one methods worked, that was swtich to EU  server, but once I logout it switched back to the old time. Here is the picture of it, need help!!!!!!

replies.body: Getting that error this early on suggests a program or setting that's blocking the patcher from scanning your game files.  Go over the steps of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access and fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Hi, thank you for reply, all the permissions guide did not work.
DIsable UAC- not working,
Windows is fully updated,
 RUN THE GAME AS AN ADMINISTRATOR- not working
There is not error in my hard drive 
re-install not working as well.

Thanks for trying, though it's a bummer that the issue persists.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs, and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for our tech team to look at.  We'll help out individually, and reply to your ticket asap!
Doing it now, thank you very much
